name: Proof_350 — Morning Feeding Time for Farm Dogs MaMeeFarm | DGCP™
description:
This proof documents the morning feeding routine for farm dogs at MaMeeFarm, recorded on
18 December 2025 at 07:37 AM (GMT+7).

The image shows several farm dogs calmly gathered near the feeding area while MaMee prepares and distributes food. Two dogs are seated in the foreground, observing the routine, while others stand closer to the feeding point, demonstrating familiarity, patience, and learned behavior.

These dogs play an essential role in daily farm operations by helping monitor the area, alerting to unusual activity, and contributing to farm security and continuity. Their behavior reflects a stable routine and long-term coexistence with human caregivers.

The feeding activity represents consistent animal care performed every morning, reinforcing mutual dependence between humans and animals within a small-scale, real-world farming system.

This record is captured as-is, without staging or enhancement, in accordance with DGCP principles of ground-truth documentation, transparency, and temporal accuracy.
The embedded timestamp in the image provides verifiable temporal evidence and continuity within MaMeeFarm’s daily proof archive.

This proof is part of the official DGCP MaMeeFarm DATA collection on OpenSea and is distributed via IPFS (ipfs.io) for immutable reference.
